name: RETRO SPACE (Ineze Studio)
description:
RETRO SPACE

The small missiles you fired that spread to the small point in the middle will gradually threaten you. Fire as many missiles as you can and survive between them!

[How to play]
w,a,s,d : Move
left click : Shoot Bullet

* It will filling of your space. warning.

* Show off your score with image in the comments!
